post_text:
Greetings to all! This will be my last post to this page. I hope that we are able to transfer its information and contents to others so that you may continue to enjoy the history of Hillsboro High School.

I have accepted a position with the Cleburne ISD and will start my new position with them on July 1. It has been my great pleasure to maintain this page for you.

"Doc" Robertson

post_text:
Greetings to all.......

It is official! The 2019 class of the HHS Athletic Hall of Fame has been announced. This year's inductees will include: Edgar Lee "E.L." Keeton - HHS Class of 1937, Charles Qualls - HHS Class of 1947, Mike Curry - HHS Class of 1957, DeShun Williams - HHS Class of 1985, and the 1956 HHS Football Team. The annual induction is set for Saturday, November 9 at 10:00 a.m. at the HHS gym. More information to come!!!!

We are searching for the whereabouts of some the the 1956 team. If you know where we can find any of the following, please let me know: Tommy Beavers, Robert Johnston, Billy Joe Kellum, Harvey McBrayer, and Harry Reese.

Have a wonderful weekend!!!!

We are searching for the whereabouts of some the the 1956 team. If you know where we can find any of the following, please let me know: Tommy Beavers, Robert Johnston, Billy Joe Kellum, Harvey McBrayer, and Harry Reese.

Have a wonderful weekend!!!!

post_text:
Good day to all.......it is with sadness that I report that HHS Athletic Hall of Fame member Marty Gray has lost his battle with cancer. His memorial service will be held Saturday morning 10:30 a.m. at the First Baptist Church in Cherokee.

Coach Gray was the head coach of the 1984-85 HHS girls basketball team and 2017 Athletic Hall of Fame inductee. He had several 20 win seasons while at the helm of the girls basketball team.

I have enjoyed greatly getting to know this fine man and I will miss his stories! Prayers for his family!
text:

I have enjoyed greatly getting to know this fine man and I will miss his stories! Prayers for his family!

post_text: Good day to all! I am looking for a little help. I am researching all sports here at Hillsboro, Texas High School. I am looking for overall records of all varsity teams, who the head coach was, opponents, scores, etc. Any information I can get will be greatly appreciated. If you have information, you can email me at robertson@hillsboroisd.org Thank you!!!!!

post_text:
Don't forget the upcoming HHS Athletic Hall of Fame induction. It will be held at 10:00 on Saturday, September 29 at the HHS Cafeteria. Troy Dungan is scheduled to be the Master of Ceremonies. Everyone is welcome to attend.

The Class of 2018 will include: Jake Fawcett - HHS Class of 1937, Arthur "Pic" Brown - Peadbody Class of 1944, Cynthia Spencer - HHS Class of 1987, Jade Hennig - HHS Class of 2008, Dr. John & Martha Erwin - Community Service Award, and the 1918 HHS Boys Track Team.

Don't forget the upcoming HHS Athletic Hall of Fame induction. It will be held at 10:00 on Saturday, September 29 at the HHS Cafeteria. Troy Dungan is scheduled to be the Master of Ceremonies. Everyone is welcome to attend.

The Class of 2018 will include: Jake Fawcett - HHS Class of 1937, Arthur "Pic" Brown - Peadbody Class of 1944, Cynthia Spencer - HHS Class of 1987, Jade Hennig - HHS Class of 2008, Dr. John & Martha Erwin - Community Service Award, and the 1918 HHS Boys Track Team.

Good day to all..........

Below is a link to what will be the first installment of the 1955 HHS Football Team and its quest for a state championship. The team was the first to be inducted into the HHS Athletic HOF. The first game to be released in against the longtime district foe Ennis Lions. The Eagles defeated the heavily favored Lions 14-7.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ISEetVEXSso

Enjoy....and please feel free to pass this along.

post_text: Just in case you may be looking for something to do this evening.....3 Hillsboro High School athletes will be playing in the FCA Victory Bowl at Waco ISD Stadium tonight at 6:30. Courtney Hewitt, Jamal Long, and Juan Deluna have done a great job representing our school this week.

post_text:
The HHS Athletic Hall of Fame Selection Committee is proud to announce the Class of 2018. The Class of 2018 will be inducted on Saturday, September 29th. So, save the date!

Jake Fawcett - HHS Class of 1937
Arthur "Pic" Brown - Peabody Class of 1944
Cynthia Spencer - HHS Class of 1987
Jade Hennig - HHS Class of 2008
Dr. John and Martha Erwin - Community Service Award
1918 HHS Boys Track Team

More information to come!!!!!!

Blessings!!!!!!!

If there is someone out there that you feel might be deserving of this honor, please complete a nomination form and get it to me by April 30th. Nomination forms can be found at the link below.

https://www.hillsboroisd.org/Page/452
